Class ActionNode

An action is performed before or after a pipeline is run.

Currently actions consist of: copy, web, tfl, run, and open.

Copy: Copies a file from from to to.

<actions>
    <add action="copy" from="c:\file1.txt" to="file2.txt" />
</actions>

Web: Execute a method (get or post) to a url. If get, the content contains the result. If post, then content is posted.

Tfl: Execute another pipeline as determined by either url, file, or content.

Run: Runs a command against a connection.

Open: Opens a file.

Inheritance
System.Object
ActionNode
Namespace:Pipeline.Configuration

Syntax
public class ActionNode : CfgNode
